sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>roof</radical> is <radical>correct</radical> only if you <kanji>determine</kanji> that it is.
meaningInfo:
Imagine looking at a roof, and someone asks you, "Is this roof correct?"

"I determine it is."
readingMnemonic: You <kanji>determine</kanji>d it, but you still have to test this determination. You go to the top and roll a <reading>ta</reading>ter (<ja>てい</ja>) tot down the roof. Tater tots will only roll down a perfectly correct roof.
readingInfo: "Because of my tater tot roof test, I have once again determined it is correct."
